name: setupdevice
objective: A Device can be added from the Bluetooth applet
description: It should be possible to pair a device from the Bluetooth applet. Bluetooth wizard UI should appear.
pre_condition: - Bluetooth technology is enabled - Bluetooth switcher is toggled on 'I'

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth applet icon
Click on the 'Set Up a New Device' option to pair a new device and wait
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices

author: zingile

name: sendfiles
objective: It is possible to send files to a device from the Bluetooth applet
description: It should be possible to send files from the Bluetooth applet. The Bluetooth sendto UI should appear.
pre_condition: - Bluetooth technology is enabled - Bluetooth switcher is toggled on 'I'

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth applet icon
Click on the 'Send Files to Device' option

author: zingile
